content: Definitely in my top ten, I'll Play The Blues for you Albert King B.B. King - anything Johnnie Lee Hooker Robert Johnson What's your favorite Blues song/artist?
reply: Definitely in my top ten, I'll Play The Blues for you Albert King B.B. King - anything Johnnie Lee Hooker Robert Johnson What's your favorite Blues song/artist?
title: I'll Play The Blues for you

content: Most definitely in my first choice of music, older the better!! Howlin Wolf John Lee Hooker Koko Taylor Sonny Boy Williamson Slim Harpo B.B. King – saw him many a time at the Valley Forge Music Fair; acoustically sound building, stage in-the-round. . .not a bad seat in the house!! They tore it down to build a shopping center Leo Kottke I am a die-hard Skynyrd fan as well. . . Etta James I could go on & on; Here – enjoy some Susan Tedeschi (1998 from "Just Won’t Burn") I wore this cassette out way back when cruisin’ with the top town; HAD to replace it with a CD http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88LNk-_Tfr8 choose joy each day
reply: Most definitely in my first choice of music, older the better!! Howlin Wolf John Lee Hooker Koko Taylor Sonny Boy Williamson Slim Harpo B.B. King – saw him many a time at the Valley Forge Music Fair; acoustically sound building, stage in-the-round. . .not a bad seat in the house!! They tore it down to build a shopping center Leo Kottke I am a die-hard Skynyrd fan as well. . . Etta James I could go on & on; Here – enjoy some Susan Tedeschi (1998 from "Just Won’t Burn") I wore this cassette out way back when cruisin’ with the top town; HAD to replace it with a CD http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=88LNk-_Tfr8 choose joy each day

content: Used to go see BB King regularly at PB Scotts Music Hall in Blowing Rock, NC.... acoustically great geodesic dome, where every seat in the house had a stage view..... Awesome times..... "http://www.highcountrypress.com/weekly/2006/04-27-06/e_pbscott.htm" "The things that will destroy America are prosperity at any price, peace at any price, safety first instead of duty first, the love of soft living and the get rich quick theory of life." ~~~Theodore Roosevelt~~~
